zone.line: Poetry is indeed something divine. It is
at once the centre & the circumference
of knowledge; it is that which comprehends
all science must be referred. It is at
the same time the root & the blossom of
all other systems of thought; it is that
from which all spring & that which
adorns all, & that which if blighted
denies the fruit & the seed, & witholds
from the barren world the nourishment
& the succession of the scions of the
tree of life. It is the perfect &
it is as the odour & colour of the
rose to the texture of the elements
